QuestData.Title: Guerrillas in our Midst
QuestData.Description: Prince Anduin Wrynn. The very son of our enemy's king! Fortune has smiled on the Horde once again, $n.$b$bBut there's another side of this coin. We'd be naive to think the child was left alone.$b$bAny Alliance scum within sight of this land must be searching desperately for their precious princeling.$b$bYou and I are going to scour the area and root out his would-be rescuers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Alliance Infiltrators near the Scenic Overlook.
